GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.10.154
GSD.description:
coresight: cti: Fix hang in cti_disable_hw()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.154 by commit e33ce54cef5d429430e3b1ae5c8ee4f4103c4fdc, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit 835d722ba10ac924adba1e8a46f2d80955222b4b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: coresight: cti: Fix hang in cti_disable_hw()
